name: Edge extends Cublet
description: A Edge is the type of Cublet that has 2 colors and sits adjacently between corners of the cube. There are 12 edges on the cube.

methods.name: Edge()
methods.description: Constructs an Edge given its solved position (x, y, z), and its orientation.

methods.name: Edge()
methods.description: Constructs a copy of the given Edge

methods.name: flip()
methods.description: Returns a new Edge representing this Edge with its orientation flipped
